column4: How can I search through a secondary hard drive for a file? locate only works on my main drive, it seems.
if you only just have attached the 2nd hdd, your locatedb has not been updated yet. Try running "sudo updatedb"
and oCean I can browse it and it shows up under "Places" as 976 GB file system. sudo updatedb doesn't appear to do anything?

I guess that means that is not currently mounted, but when you go through Places to that filesystem, it gets mounted under /media. The fact that updatedb does not do 'anything' means that is has nothing to update. As soon as you have mounted the 2nd filesystem, you should run the updatedb command
